name: A Tiny Tech Demo
description:
A Tiny Tech Demo is exactly what it say it is,  a small tech demo. Armed with a shrink ray you must shrink and grow objects to progress through the level. Also there are flying UFOs. A short demo to show off some mechanics in Unreal 5 Early Access made for a vertical gaming studio at Texas A&M University.  

Key Board Controls:

WASD to Move

Spacebar to Jump

Use Mouse to Aim

Right Click to Shrink

Left Click to Grow 

Hold Middle Mouse Button/Scroll Wheel to Pick Up Small Objects

Controller Controls:

Right Stick to Move

A Button to Jump

Left Stick to Aim

Left Trigger to Shrink

Right Trigger to Grow 

Hold Right Bumper or X Button to Pick Up Small Objects
